mapper.sql: costume_id, costume_name, costume_no, costume_intro, type_id, model_id, style_id, component_id, weave_id, costume_color, costume_age, costume_season, costume_picture1, costume_picture2, costume_picture3, costume_picture4, costume_fabulous, costume_reltime, costume_status
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM fcscostume AS a LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(fabulous_id) AS number,information_id FROM fcsfabulous GROUP BY information_id) AS b ON a.costume_id = b.information_id ORDER BY b.number DESC LIMIT #{arg0},#{arg1}

SELECT
FROM fcscostume AS a LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(comment_id) AS number,commentary_id FROM fcscomment GROUP BY comment_id) AS b ON a.costume_id = b.commentary_id ORDER BY b.number DESC LIMIT #{arg0},#{arg1}
